contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of April, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permissible). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
